kalimba.name: KALIMBA

takofuusen.condition: Encounter Takofuusen in the White Desert

blackcat.name: Чёрный кот
blackcat.condition: Полетайте на метле с крыши здания

haunted_mirror.name: Haunted Mirror
haunted_mirror.condition: See the Woman in the Mirror event in the Ocean Storehouse

black_king.name: Black King
black_king.condition: Enter the chess board in Chess World

zalgo.name: Zalgo's Lament
zalgo.condition: Reach the room accessible from the Zalgo event in the Magnet Room

aooh.name: Взор Aooh'а
aooh.condition: Trigger the Aooh event in Ahogeko's House

snow_fairy.name: Snowy Fairy
snow_fairy.condition: Interact with the Snow Fairy in the Snowy Forest

operator_cyborg.name: Rusted Memory
operator_cyborg.condition: Resonate with the Cyborg Operator in the Rusty Urban Complex

hakoko.name: Hakoko
hakoko.condition: Interact with Hakoko in the Eye Shop

hakoko_prime.name: Hakoko Prime
hakoko_prime.condition: Reach and interact with Hakoko in {TIME} or less in Time Trial Mode

fabric_planet.name: Fabric Planet
fabric_planet.condition: Reach the Fabric Planet at Moonview Lane

fabric_galaxy.name: Fabric Galaxy
fabric_galaxy.condition: Reach the Fabric Planet at Moonview Lane in {TIME} or less in Time Trial Mode

lavender.name: Сиреневый Камень
lavender.condition: Доберитесь до Lavender Waters за {TIME} или быстрее в Time Trial Mode

butterfly.name: Twilight Butterfly Brooch
butterfly.condition: Доберитесь до Lunar Sanctuary за {TIME} или быстрее в Time Trial Mode

magical.name: Merlin
magical.condition: Reach Magical Passage in {TIME} or less in Time Trial Mode

voxels.name: Magical Voxels
voxels.condition: Exploit the rules of the dream realm and reach Voxel Island

digital_rose.name: Digital Rose
digital_rose.condition: Bloom all of the gray roses in the Neon Caves

singularity.name: Miniature Singularity
singularity.condition: Find and interact with All 6 Black Hole Girls in Rio's worlds. If you have already done so previously, you must visit the area where you found them.

circus.name: The Greatest Show
circus.condition: Complete the High Priestess event without being caught by a single chaser

vending_machine.name: Vending Machine
vending_machine.condition: Complete and visit the Snack Gallery

graffiti.name: The Farthest
graffiti.description: She is still dreaming to this day...
graffiti.condition: View all the endings and reach the farthest room of Urotsuki's dream world

cake.name: Chocolate Cake
cake.condition: Eat at least 20 pieces of cake at Sugar Hole

inkblot_test.name: Inkblot Test
inkblot_test.condition: Trigger the Therapy event in the Deranged Faces Zone
